name: Meet Patel

projects.title: ConnectStud -  Students Social Media Platform
projects.description: ConnectStud is a web-based platform aimed at connecting college students with alumni. The platform facilitates interaction by allowing users to post and participate in hackathons and college events, share news, and engage in one-on-one chats for mentorship, career advice, and job guidance.

aboutpara:
Hi, I'm Meet Patel, a passionate web developer focused on building clean, user-friendly, and responsive websites. I specialize in technologies like React, Node.js, Redux, Git etc, and love turning complex problems into elegant, efficient solutions.

I'm always eager to learn new tools, contribute to meaningful projects, and grow as a developer. Whether it's frontend design or backend logic, I enjoy every step of the development journey.

When Iâ€™m not coding, youâ€™ll find me exploring open-source communities or diving into the latest tech trends.
